author: wmtan
body:
This trivial pull request fixes the compilation errors in CondFormats/BTauObjects and RecoBTag/PerformanceDB.  The same changes are already in 7_5_X.
Please merge as soon as convenient, bypassing L2 signatures if not signed promptly.
Note: The preexisting build error in Fireworks/Core is unaffected by this PR.
title: Fixes for compilation errors in CondFormats and RecoBTag
